text: Kristin Diane Jacobs (October 17, 1959 â€“ April 11, 2020) was an American Democratic politician. He was a member of the Florida House of Representatives from 2014 until her death in 2020. She represented the 96th District. She was Mayor of Broward County from 2004 to 2005 and again from 2012 to 2013. Jacobs was born in San Diego, California. Jacobs died on April 11, 2020 in Coconut Creek, Florida of colon cancer at the age of 60. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:Members of the Florida Legislature Category:American mayors Category:Politicians from San Diego Category:Politicians from Florida Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Kristin Jacobs
